Europe Data Science Conference – KDnuggets Offer – ends Fri, 8 June

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Data Science, Europe, London, ODSC, UK

Register for ODSC Europe 2018, leading Data Science conference in Europe - best rate ends June 8. Use code KDNuggets to save.


 

The Open Data Science Conference is Europe’s leading data science conference. Over 4 days get access to 48 total tracks, 84 workshop/training sessions, 130+ presentations.

 

The current Best Price for ODSC Europe ends at 11:59 PM GMT this Friday, June 8, 2018. Save hundreds on door prices with 60% off.

 

For Europe 2018 we are bringing you an incredibly talented lineup of internationally renowned speakers and instructors including:

  • Jürgen Schmidhuber, World's foremost Deep Learning expert & Professor at IDSIA
  • Andreas Mueller - NYU ML Professor and core contributor to scikit-learn
  • Jared Lander - Leading R instructor and Author of “R for Everyone”
  • Michael S -  Named top 7 Data Scientist by Forbes, Chief Scientist, DataRobot
  • Jeffrey Yau - Global Head of Data Science, Alliance Bernstein, UC Berkeley Lecturer
  • Thomas Wiecki, Director of Data Science at Quantopian and PyMC3 core contributor
  • And 130 more training, workshop and talk presenters.

Totaling over 200 hours of applied talks, workshops, and training session, we offer the widest choice of the most important topics in data science. ODSC Europe 2018 will also feature:

 

  • 47 introductory to advanced sessions in machine learning, deep learning, predictive analytics, data visualization, quant finance, and more
  • Accelerate AI Summit | A full day of AI innovation, discussions for business professionals, executives, and startups looking to disrupt industry with AI
  • Full day job fair to help you find your next career move
  • Special events like Meet the Experts, Dinner with Data Scientists, Networking Reception, and more

 

Use code KDNuggets until Friday, June 8, 2018, and save 60% on your pass to ODSC Europe 2018. Register for ODSC Europe 2018

 

See you there!
